select * from (select A.*, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS RN FROM (SELECT * FROM free_board WHERE 1 = 1
AND( free_title like '%${searchKeyword}%' OR free_content like '%${searchKeyword}%' OR user_name like '%${searchKeyword}%')
order by free_board_no desc) A, (select @ROWNUM := 0) D ) B where 1 = 1
AND RN > (#{page}-1) * #{amount} AND RN <= #{page} * #{amount}
